name: Axis Football 2017
description: Axis Football is an American football simulation featuring massive customization and a complete franchise mode
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10.1 compatible 512MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
